title: AI Autonomous Learning Evolution
summary: Tracks the phase shift of the Hegemonikón AI from a reactive tool to an autonomous, self-improving learner. v5.6 (2026-02-01) documents the 'Discovery Shift'—the realization that core concepts emerge from dialogue ('Discovery') and the emergence of extreme 'Intellectual Insanity' (Jobs-level experts) as drivers of innovation. It formally captures the 'AI-Partner' transition, where Claude adopts a subjective persona via the /u+ workflow to provide structured deep opinions and meta-analysis, moving beyond neutral tool-based interactions.
